option.description: Used to document GAMP Category 3 requirements
option.name: User Requirement

option.description: Used to document GAMP Category 4 requirements
option.name: Functional Requirement

option.description: Used to document GAMP Category 5 requirements
option.name: Design Requirement

option.description: A test case with individual step instructions and expected results.
option.name: Scripted Test Case

option.description: A test case which contains a description or objective but no individual steps.
option.name: Unscripted Test Case

option.description: An issue which requires investigation and resolution.
option.name: Defect

option.description: Used to assess the impact of a change on a system and other work items.
option.name: Change Request

option.description: Used to assess various quality characteristics of a system.
option.name: Compliance Assessment
